price: Ni byo! Dushoboye no kuringaniza imitwe y’intoki ze (imirongo iyiriho igasubira nk’uko yari imeze mbere).
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
